title: Failure at last iteration
body:
The active learning process fails at the last iteration (when the pool is empty). 

This happens when you use a fast model in simulation mode. 
``` 
python -m asr simulate ../schoot-lgmm-ptsd.csv --model nb --n_queries 10
```

```python
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/Users/jonathan/.pyenv/versions/anaconda3-2018.12/lib/python3.7/runpy.py", line 193, in _run_module_as_main
    "__main__", mod_spec)
  File "/Users/jonathan/.pyenv/versions/anaconda3-2018.12/lib/python3.7/runpy.py", line 85, in _run_code
    exec(code, run_globals)

    _review_simulate()

    review_simulate(path, **args_dict)

  File "/Users/jonathan/.pyenv/versions/anaconda3-2018.12/lib/python3.7/site-packages/modAL/models/base.py", line 194, in query
    query_result = self.query_strategy(self, *query_args, **query_kwargs)
  File "/Users/jonathan/.pyenv/versions/anaconda3-2018.12/lib/python3.7/site-packages/modAL/uncertainty.py", line 155, in uncertainty_sampling
    query_idx = multi_argmax(uncertainty, n_instances=n_instances)
  File "/Users/jonathan/.pyenv/versions/anaconda3-2018.12/lib/python3.7/site-packages/modAL/utils/selection.py", line 50, in multi_argmax
    assert n_instances <= values.shape[0], 'n_instances must be less or equal than the size of utility'
```

@parisa-zahedi This is the problem.

Temp fix would be setting the n_queries argument.

```
$ python -m asr simulate ../schoot-lgmm-ptsd.csv --model nb --n_queries 20
```
